topic: Renewable energy adoption in urban cities

queries.query: renewable energy adoption statistics urban areas 2024

results.title: IEA Urban Energy Transition Report 2024
results.snippet: Urban centers added 35% more solar capacity in 2023, driven by incentives and declining PV costs.

results.title: Smart Cities Council Survey
results.snippet: Top challenges include grid integration, financing, and regulatory alignment across municipalities.

results.title: UN Habitat Clean Energy Policies
results.snippet: City-level climate action plans mandate 50% renewable procurement for municipal operations by 2030.
